column1: As the nation prepares to celebrate Thanksgiving I am reminded of the many blessings in my life and all that I am thankful for including my family friends neighbors and constituents. Enjoy a safe and happy Thanksgiving! #thanksgiving #gratitude #family #faith https://t.co/CcztOisunX
